DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect TEAS pretreatment treatment hepatic renal dysfunction induce pneumoperitoneum patient undergo laparoscopic surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Transcutaneous Electrical Acupoint Stimulation ( TEAS ) Hepatic Renal Dysfunction After Pneumoperitoneum
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly assign three group , control group two intervention group , receive TEAS general anesthesia induction respectively . TEAS give electrode attached acupoints . The time TEAS 30min . Venous blood sample collect 20min pneumoperitoneum . Hepatic renal function index include AST , ALT , ALP , BUN , Cr measure .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18yrs , < 60yrs； ASA 12； Scheduled laparoscopic surgery general anesthesia； Informed consent Patients hepatic renal dysfunction； Patients severe hypertension cardiac dysfunction； Patients severe pulmonary disease； Patients hemoglobin < 100g/L
